imdb.plot outline: Linear time travel may be enough for some, but the ability to experience other worlds and universes entirely, was the only traveling Dr. Habeaux wanted to achieve. However, the dangers of his secret forced Dr. Habeaux to flee earth, leaving his son Hobo, with the responsibility to protect the secret. Hobo's naiveté results in the theft of the secret, and the journey he decides to embark on to retrieve it, and clean up his mess, unfolds across amazing worlds we never knew existed.
imdb.title: Hobo: The Legion of Travelers
akas: Hobo: The Legion of Travelers (United States)
plot: The HOBO series takes the audience on an incredible journey through amazing worlds and universes as we follow Hobo Habeaux in his quest to retrieve the stolen portal key his father entrusted him to protect.::PMN

Linear time travel may be enough for some, but the ability to experience other worlds and universes entirely, was the only traveling Dr. Habeaux wanted to achieve. However, the dangers of his secret forced Dr. Habeaux to flee earth, leaving his son Hobo, with the responsibility to protect the secret. Hobo's naiveté results in the theft of the secret, and the journey he decides to embark on to retrieve it, and clean up his mess, unfolds across amazing worlds we never knew existed.::Anonymous
